column6: A FUNERAL IN BERLIN, PART 2 OF 3 The Torch and Toro explore the city of New Berlin, where Hitler won the war, the Nazi Reich is conquering the world one piece at a time, and the regime's ultimate champion is a man of fire... Rated T  ...$3.99
